book.synopsis: As the mutant population grows, Cassandra Nova utilizes extraterrestrial technology and her mysterious relationship with Charles Xavier to destroy mutantkind, battling X-Men Cyclops, Jean Grey, Emma Frost, Wolverine, and Beast.
book.title_long: New X-Men Vol. 1: E is for Extinction
book.dimensions: Height: 9.5 Inches, Length: 6.5 Inches, Weight: 0.5 Pounds, Width: 0.25 Inches
